no_projects.message: Keine Projekte oder kein Netzwerk verfügbar.
no_projects.description: indicates that the account has no Codeship projects or that there was a network error

no_builds.message: Zu diesem Projekt gibt es noch keine Builds.
no_builds.description: indicates that the selected project has not run any builds on Codeship yet

paste_api_key.message: Füge deinen Codeship API Key ein.
paste_api_key.description: placeholder text to paste your api key from your clipboard

copy_api_key.message: Kopiere den API Key von deinem Codeship Account.
